        Sets the stroke color
        Parameters:
        myColor - the new stroke color for the shape

      • draw

        public abstract void draw()
        Draws the Shape onto the PApplet
        Precondition
        All styles must be set before the draw() method is called. SetSurface must be called to assign a PApplet to which the Shape is to be drawn.
        Postcondition
        The PApplet associated with the Shape now contains the Shape drawn in the window.
